00062 /***************************************************************************/
00081 void CRC_Init(CRC_Init_TypeDef const *init)
00082 {
00083   /* Sanity check of bitsPerWord. */
00084   EFM_ASSERT(init->bitsPerWord < 16U);
00085 
00086   /* Set CRC control configuration parameters such as CRC width, byte and bit
00087    * bit order, the number of bits per word, inverting input/output, etc. */
00088   CRC->CTRL = (uint32_t)init->crcWidth
00089               | (uint32_t)init->byteReverse
00090               | (uint32_t)init->inputBitOrder
00091               | (uint32_t)init->bitReverse
00092               | ((uint32_t)init->bitsPerWord >> _CRC_CTRL_BITSPERWORD_SHIFT)
00093               | ((uint32_t)init->inputPadding >> _CRC_CTRL_PADCRCINPUT_SHIFT)
00094               | ((uint32_t)init->invInput >> _CRC_CTRL_INPUTINV_SHIFT)
00095               | ((uint32_t)init->invOutput >> _CRC_CTRL_OUTPUTINV_SHIFT);
00096 
00097   /* Set CRC polynomial value. */
00098   CRC->POLY = init->crcPoly;
00099 
00100   /* Load CRC initialization value to CRC_INIT. Please note, that the
00101    * initialization is not performed here! */
00102   CRC->INIT = init->initValue;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 /***************************************************************************/
00110 void CRC_Reset(void)
00111 {
00112   /* Reset CRC registers to their default value. */
00113   CRC->CTRL = _CRC_CTRL_RESETVALUE;
00114   CRC->POLY = _CRC_POLY_RESETVALUE;
00115   CRC->INIT = _CRC_INIT_RESETVALUE;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00122 #endif /* defined(CRC_COUNT) && (CRC_COUNT > 0) */
